channel.title: Everybody's mountain
channel.description:
A series on educational leadership and imagination in the United States today.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The team teaching experiment of Harvard University and Lexington, Massachusetts
item.description: In the eleventh program in this series, the concept of team teaching is explored.
item.dc:creator: Shayon, Robert Lewis
item.dc:subject: Teaching teams
